elements.content: On page 531, column 2, there is a typo in eq 2. The correct exponent for the term between parentheses is “–6” not “6”.
elements.clean_text: On page 531, column 2, there is a typo in eq 2. The correct exponent for the term between parentheses is "-6" not "6".

metadata.title:
Correction to Highly Fluorescent Metal–Organic-Framework
Nanocomposites for Photonic Applications
